panels.title: Nodes Up

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.95, sum(rate(redpanda_kafka_request_latency_seconds_bucket{instance=~"$node", redpanda_request="consume"}[$__rate_interval])) by (le, provider, region, instance, namespace, pod))

panels.title: Latency of Kafka consume requests (p95) per broker

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(redpanda_kafka_request_latency_seconds_bucket{instance=~"$node", redpanda_request="consume"}[$__rate_interval])) by (le, provider, region, instance, namespace, pod))

panels.title: Latency of Kafka consume requests (p99) per broker
Partitions
